text: × TMZ : Meghan Markle ’ s half - sister Samantha hospitalized with possible broken ankle FLORIDA — Meghan Markle ’ s half sister, Samantha, is in the hospital after suffering what appears to be a broken ankle and a fractured knee after a confrontation with the paparazzi, TMZ is reporting. Samantha ’ s boyfriend, Mark, told TMZ they were driving in Florida near a toll booth when they had a “ paparazzi confrontation. ” He said the photographer veered in front of them, trying to get a clear shot. Her boyfriend said he swerved to the left in an attempt to avoid him and hit a concrete barrier. He said Samantha hit the windshield and fell to the floor mat. Samantha, who has MS, was unable to lift herself up.
